projectGridLines.title: Project Details
projectGridLines.description:
Problem Statement: Serviceability Platform

Refine our existing Serviceability Platform to more effectively connect restaurants, merchants, and riders with

user orders. The aim is to enhance geographical coverage, more accurately balance demand with supply,

reduce response times, and strategically manage resources to improve operational efficiency and elevate

customer satisfaction.

Problem Statement: Rider Assignment System

Refine our existing Rider Assignment System in our delivery app to better match orders with available riders

with the focus on improving delivery speed, reducing operational costs, and increasing rider and customer

satisfaction.

Problem Statement: Fraud Detection System

Improving our existing fraud detection system to effectively identify and prevent fraudulent activities across our

platform. The focus will be on implementing advanced algorithms that can detect unusual patterns, improve

5/3/24, 5:19 PM BITS Pilani University Mail - Fwd: Reg: BITS Pilani PS II@ Zomato: July 4 to Dec 14 2024


https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?ik=9233a0bef6&view=pt&search=all&permthid=thread-f:1798014171331664025&simpl=msg-f:179801417133... 1/11


real-time response capabilities, and reduce false positives.

Problem Statement: ETA Prediction

Improving our existing system to improve the accuracy of Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) predictions with the

focus on incorporating real-time traffic data, historical travel times, and predictive models to refine ETA

calculations providing users with more reliable and precise arrival times and giving top notch experience on the

platform.

Problem Statement: Distance computation between user and restaurant location

Improving our current distance computation matrix to ensure more accurate and efficient route distance

calculations and route optimization incorporating real-time traffic data, historical traveled paths and various

other features.

AI/ML

Natural Language Search

Conversational Ordering Experience

Automated Customer Support Assistance

Menu Digitization and Automated Image Enhancement

Voice based Calling Assistants

Behavior Segmentation
